data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The principal of the school is going to make some changes. He ____ on ____ more ____ teachers ____ paying ____ old ____ more ____. He ____ is ____ to ____ a ____ team ____ the ____. The school hasn't had a dance in the past, but he is planning for one in the spring.
data.partBlankContent: The principal of the school is going to make some changes. He pl___ on hir___ more n__ teachers a__ paying t__ old teac____ more mo___. He al__ is go___ to st___ a baske_____ team f__ the stud____. The school hasn't had a dance in the past, but he is planning for one in the spring.
data.fullContent: The principal of the school is going to make some changes. He plans on hiring more new teachers and paying the old teachers more money. He also is going to start a basketball team for the students. The school hasn't had a dance in the past, but he is planning for one in the spring.
data.answer: 这所学校的校长打算做一些改变。他计划雇用更多新教师，并付给老教师更多的钱。他还将为学生们组建一支篮球队。学校过去没有举办过舞会，但他计划在春天举办一次。
